WorkItem.Description: The Pally tier pieces are listed in the comparison charts for DPSDK instead of the actual DK tier pieces

Comments.Message: I am aware of this issue.  The Death Knight DPS module is NOT complete... and there are definitely inaccuracies in it right now.  It's kind of included in Rawr right now as an alpha, something you can play with but isn't in a working state.  I'm aware of most of the DK bugs, the reason this particular one exists is because the DK module was essentially copied off the Retribution module (which I also work on) and I haven't changed some things.  Feel free to convert the class type on the DK sets to Paladin in the meantime.

Thanks for the quick reply Zurm (and the tip on converting the DK items to Pally).  Been following your posts among others on EJ since the beta, and I appreciate the effort you've put into this.  I figured it was copied from the Pally model when I saw Demonic Pact was showing as a DPS increase for us.  :)
